juzs.text: Blessed is He in Whose hand is the kingdom (of the universe) and He has power over everything
Who created death and life to test you (as to) which of you is best in deeds, and He is the Mighty, the Protectively Forgiving

Who created the seven skies (higher levels) in accordance with each other, you do not see in the creation of the Beneficent (God) any discordance, then look again. Do you see any rifts (discontinuity)
Then look again and yet again, your sight will return to you defeated (in its purpose) and it will be tired
And We adorned the sky of the world with lamps and We made them missiles for the devils and We have prepared for them the punishment of blazing fire
And for those who do not believe in their Lord, is the punishment of hell and it is an evil destination
When they will be thrown into it, they will hear its roaring and it will blaze
almost bursting with fury. Whenever a batch is thrown into it, its guards will ask them, “Did no warner come to you?”
They will say, “Why not! a warner had indeed come to us, but we denied and we said: God has not sent down anything, you are in nothing but great error.”
And they will say, “Had we but listened or understood, we would not have been among the inhabitants of blazing fire.”
So they will confess their sins, therefore away with the inhabitants of the blazing fire
Those who fear their Lord without having seen (Him), for them there is certainly protective forgiveness and a great reward
And (whether) you hide your word or manifest it, He is the Knower of what the bosoms (hearts) possess
Will He Who created not know, when He is the Subtilely Informed
He it is Who has made the earth subdued for you, so move about in its surroundings and eat from His provision and to Him will be the return after death
Or are you secure from Him Who is in the sky, that He will (not) make the earth sink with you when it is repeatedly shaken (during an earth quake)
Or are you secure from Him Who is in the sky, that He will (not) send on you a sandstorm (or volcanic debris)? Then you will know how My warning was
And those before them indeed denied, then how was My rejection (of them)
Or did they not see towards the birds above them, spreading and contracting (their wings)? No one holds them except the Beneficent (God), He is certainly the Seer of everything
Or who is it that will act as an army for you to help you, besides the Beneficent (God)? The disbelievers are in nothing but deception
Or who is it who will provide for you if He withholds His provision? No, they persist in revolt and hatred
Then, is he who walks headlong on his face better guided or he who walks balanced (on his feet and) on the straight path
Say, “He it is Who produced you and made for you (the faculties of) hearing and seeing and the hearts, little is the gratitude you show.”
Say, “He it is Who has multiplied (and spread) you in the earth and towards Him you will be gathered.”
And they say, “When will this promise (be fulfilled) if you are truthful?”
Say, “The knowledge (of it) is only with God and I am only a clear warner.”
So when they see it near, the faces of those who did not believe will be grieved and it will be said, “This is what you used to ask for.”
Say, “Have you considered, God can destroy me and those with me or be merciful to us, but who will protect the disbelievers from the painful punishment?”
Say, “He is the Beneficent, we believe in Him and put our trust in Him, so you will come to know who it is that is in clear error.”
Say, “Have you considered, if your water were to go down, then who will bring flowing water?”
Noon. By the pen and that which they write (with it)
by the grace of your Lord you are not under the influence of the jinn
And there is certainly a reward for you, which will never fail
And you are certainly of an exalted character
So you will see and they (too) will see (as to)
which of you is afflicted (with madness)
Your Lord certainly knows best him who has gone astray from His way and He knows best those who receive guidance
So do not obey the liars
they like that you should compromise, so that they (too) would compromise
And do not obey any disgraceful person who swears much
defamer, going about spreading slander
forbidder of good, exceeder of limits, sinful
merciless, besides that, mean
because he possesses wealth and sons
When Our signs are recited to him, he says, “Stories of the ancient.”
We will brand him on the nose
We tried them as We tried the inhabitants of the garden when they swore that they would pluck its fruit in the morning
and they did not like to keep aside (a portion for the poor)
So there went around it, a circuit (of disaster) from your Lord while they were asleep
so that the (garden) became as if (it was already) plucked
And they cried out to each other in the morning
saying, “Go to your field in the morning, if you are to pluck (the fruits).”
So they went whispering to one another
that, “No poor man shall enter it today (to beg) from you.”
And (when they went) in the morning, (they presumed that) they had power on their determination (to pluck the fruit)
but when they saw it, they said, “We are certainly in error
no, we are those who have been deprived (of receiving the benefit of our labour).”
One balanced among them said, “Did I not tell you? Had you glorified (by regarding God above all, this would not have happened).”
They said, “Glorified be our Lord, we were certainly unjust.”
Then they turned, some blaming the others
They said, “Sorrowful is our state, we were rebellious
it may be that our Lord will give us in exchange, a better (garden) than this; to our Lord (we turn as) seekers (of His grace).”
Such was the punishment, and the punishment of the hereafter is greater, had they but known
For those who guard (against evil), there will certainly be gardens of bliss with their Lord
Shall We make those who submit (as Muslims), like the criminals
What is (wrong) with you? How do you judge
Or have you a book through which you learn
that you shall have therein what you choose
Or do you have an agreement from Us which extends till the day of resurrection that you will have what you order (for)
Ask them, which of them will be a claimant of that
Or have they partners? Then let them bring their partners if they are truthful
On the day (the covering) will be removed from the ankle (there being a calamity), and they will be called for prostrations, but they will not be able to (prostrate)
their looks will be humbled, disgrace will cover them. And indeed they used to be called for prostrations when they were sound, (but they used to refuse)
So leave Me and him who denies this statement, We will gradually catch them from such a position that they will not know
And I give them time, My plot is certainly firm
Do you ask them for a reward so that they are burdened with a lasting difficulty
Or is (the knowledge of) the unseen with them, so that they write (it) down
So wait patiently for the command of your Lord and do not be like the companion of the fish (Jonah) when he called out while he was in grief
Had the favour of his Lord not reached him, he would have been (left) cast on the naked shore while he was blamed
Then his Lord chose him and made him of the righteous

And those who do not believe, when they hear the reminder, (give such an impression) by their looks that they would almost pull you down from your position and say, “He is indeed under the influence of the jinn.”
And this is nothing but a reminder to the worlds
The truth
What is the truth
And what will make you realize what the truth is
Thamud and Aad denied the disaster
So as for Thamud, they were destroyed by the thunder and lightning
And as for Aad, they were destroyed by a violently furious wind
which He imposed on them for seven nights and eight days continuously, so that you could see people lying therein, overthrown as if they were the hollow trunks of date palms
So do you see anyone of them remaining
And Pharaoh and those before him and the overthrown cities, (all) were involved in faults
so they disobeyed the messenger of their Lord therefore He seized them with a severe seizure
When the water overflowed We carried you in the ship
so as to make it a reminder for you and that remembering ears may keep it in memory
So when it will be blown into the trumpet (structure of the universe, with) a single blowing
and the earth will be carried away with the mountains then crushed to pieces with a single crushing
then on that day the event will befall
And the sky will be split asunder, so that day it will be weak
And the angels will be on its sides, and on that day, eight will bear the throne of your Lord above them
On that day all of you will be presented, no secret of yours will be hidden
So, as for him who is given his record in his right hand, he will say, “Take read my record
I was expecting that I would certainly encounter my account (of deeds).”
So he will be in a pleasant life
in a high garden
the clusters of which will be near
(It will be said to him), “Eat and drink pleasantly because of that which you sent before you during the days that are gone (i.e. during the life of the world).”
And as for him who is given his record in his left hand, he will say, “I wish my record had not been given to me
and I had not known what my account (of deeds) was
wish the (death) had made an end of me
my wealth has not made me carefree from (this)
my authority has gone away from me.”
(It will be said), “Catch him then chain him
then make him enter the hell
then make him to enter into a chain, the length of which is seventy cubits(forearm length)
He had not believed in God, the Great
and he had not urged on the feeding of the poor
so he (too) this day, has no intimate friend here
nor any food except the corruption from the washings of wounds
none will eat it except the defaulters.”
So I do swear by that which you see
and that which you do not see (that)
This (Quran) is certainly the word of an honoured messenger
and it is not a word of a poet, little is it that you believe
and it is not a word of a soothsayer, little is it that you mind
(it has been) sent down from the Lord of the worlds
And had he said some words about Us on his own behalf (and attributed them to Us, then)
We would have seized him by his right hand
then We would have cut off the artery of his heart
and not one of you could have withheld Us from him
And it is certainly a reminder for those who guard (against evil)
And We certainly know that among you are deniers
And it will certainly be (a source of) regret for the disbelievers
And surely it is the truth (deserving) certainty
So glorify the name of your Great Lord
A questioner asked about the punishment to fall
For the disbelievers, there will be no defender for it
(It will be) from God, Possessor of the ways of ascent
The angels and the spirit ascend to Him, in a day (period), the measure of which is fifty thousand years
So be patient with the patience that is good
They certainly see it far
while We see it near
The day when the sky will become like molten brass
and the mountains will be like coloured wool
and (even) an intimate friend will not inquire from another intimate friend
(though) they will be made to see each other. The criminal would love to ransom himself from the punishment of that day by (sacrificing even) his sons
and his wife and his brother
and his family which gave him shelter
and whosoever is in the earth, all, (and) then save himself
By no means ! it is certainly a flaming fire
taking off the skin
It will invite him who turned back (from the truth) and went away
and amassed (wealth) then withheld (it)
Man is certainly hasty (by) character
when evil afflicts him he is impatient
and when good (even) touches him (he) is niggardly
except the worshippers (those who offer salat)
who are constant at their worship (salat)
and in whose wealth there is a known (portion as the) right
of one who asks and of one who is deprived (yet does not ask)
and those who accept the truth of the day of judgment
and those who are fearful of the punishment of their Lord
the punishment of their Lord is certainly (something from which) one should not feel secure
and those who guard their private parts
except from their wives or whom their right hands possess, so in their case they are not to be blamed
but whoever seeks (something) beyond that, then those are the persons who are transgressors
and those who are faithful to their trusts and their agreements
and those who stand firm on their testimonies
and those who are custodians of their worship (salat)
They will be honoured in gardens
So what is the matter with those who do not believe that they rush towards you
from your right and from your left, in groups
Does every man among them hope that he will be made to enter the garden of bliss
By no means ! they know (the thing) from which We created them
So I do swear by the Lord of the rising places/times and setting places/times (of the sun), that We are certainly able
to replace (them by others) better than them and We are not to be overcome
So leave them involved in idle talk and play, till they meet their day which they are promised
The day they will come out from their graves in haste, as if rushing towards a goal
(with) their eyes humbled, disgrace covering them, that is the day which they were promised
We had sent Noah to his people, (saying), “Warn your people before a painful punishment comes on them.”
He said, “O my people ! I am a clear warner to you
that you should serve (worship) God and fear Him and obey me
He will (for give and) protect you from your sins and give you time till an appointed term. When the term of God comes (to an end), it will certainly not be postponed, had you but known.”
He said, “My Lord! I invited my people (towards You) night and day
but my invitation did not increase in them anything except running away (from the truth)

And whenever I invited them that You will protectively forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears and covered, themselves with garments and persisted (in refusing) and considered themselves great (due to) pride
Then I invited them aloud
then I invited them publicly and secretly in private
then I said: Seek protective forgiveness of your Lord, He is certainly Protectively Forgiving
He will send on you abundant rain from the sky
and will help you with wealth and sons and He will make gardens for you and He will make rivers for you
What is (wrong) with you, do you not expect God to be serious (about the above promises)
And He has created you (through) different stages
Did you not consider how God created the seven skies (higher levels) in accordance with each other
and made the moon therein (a source of reflected) light and made the sun a lamp
And God caused you to grow from the earth (as a) growth
then He returns you into it and He will bring you out, a bringing out
And God has made the earth a wide expanse for you
that you may move therein on wide ways.”
Noah said, “My Lord, they disobeyed me, and followed him whose wealth and children added to him nothing but loss
And they planned a great plan
And they said: Do not leave your gods, nor leave Wadd, nor Suwa nor Yagus and Yauq and Nasr
And they have misled many, and You do not (give) increase to the unjust persons in anything but error.”
They were drowned because of their faults, then made to enter the fire, and they did not find for themselves any helpers besides God
And Noah said, “My Lord! do not leave on the earth any dweller from among the disbelievers
for if you leave them they will mislead your servants and they will not give birth to any but transgressing, ungrateful (children)

My Lord ! protectively forgive me and my parents and him who enters my house as a believer, and the believing men and the believing women and do not (give) increase to the unjust persons, in anything but ruin.”
Say: It is communicated to me that a party of the jinn heard (the Quran) and said, “We have heard a wonderful Quran
It guides to the right way, so we have believed in it and we will never associate any partner with our Lord
And Exalted be the Majesty of our Lord, He has not taken a wife or a son
And the foolish among us used to say unjust (things) about God
And we thought that mankind and jinn never speak a lie against God
And persons from among human beings used to seek protection of persons from among the jinn so they increased them in error
And they (too) thought as you thought that God will never raise anyone (to life after death)
And we searched the sky but found it filled with strong guards and flames
And we used to sit in some of the sitting places thereof to hear, but now whoever hears, he finds a flame waiting for him
And we do not know whether evil is intended for those who are in the earth or their Lord intends (to guide) them to the right way
And among us are those who are righteous and among us (are those who are) other than that, we are sects following different traditions
And we know that we can neither defeat God in the earth nor can we defeat Him by flight
And when we heard the guidance, we believed in it, so whoever believes in his Lord, he should neither fear loss nor error
And among us are those who have submitted (as Muslims) and among us are those who are unjust. So those who have submitted (as Muslims) such have taken to the right way
And as for those who are unjust, they are the fuel for hell.”
And if they establish (themselves) on (the right) tradition We would give them to drink abundant water
so that We may test them thereby, and whoever turns away from the remembrance of his Lord He will cause him to enter severe punishment
And the mosques are God's so do not pray to anyone (else along) with God
And when the servant of God stood up to pray to Him they almost crowded over him
Say, “I pray only to my Lord and I do not associate anyone with Him.”
Say, “I certainly do not control for you anything, wrong or right.”
Say, “None can ever protect me against God and I can never find besides Him, (any source of) refuge

(my duty is nothing) but to convey (the communications) from God and His messages, and whoever disobeys God and His messenger, then for such, there is certainly the fire , of hell, in which they will stay forever.” which they will stay forever.”
(The disbelievers will not believe) till (the time) when they see that which they are promised, then they will know who is weaker in helpers and lesser in number
Say, “I do not know whether that which you are promised is nearer or whether my Lord has made its (time of happening) far off.”
Knower of the unseen, but He does not reveal His unseen to anyone
except to a messenger whom He chooses, but He makes one who is watchful, to move before him and behind him
that He may know (mark out) that they have indeed conveyed the messages of their Lord. And He encompasses all that is with them and He computes the number of everything
O you who are wrapped up in garments
Rise (to pray in) the night except a little
half of it or a little less than that
or increase it and recite the Quran gradually (giving) intervals
We will put on you (the responsibility of delivering) a weighty statement
The rising at night (for righteous work) certainly gives rise to more strength of co-ordination and firmly established speech (because)
during the day you certainly have prolonged occupation
And remember the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him (with exclusive) devotion
Lord of the east and the west, there is no god except Him, so take Him as a Trustee
And be patient on what they say and keep away from them in a good (manner of) keeping away
And leave Me and the deniers, the possessors of favours (from Me) and give them a little time
Certainly, with Us are heavy fetters and hell fire
and a food that chokes and a painful punishment
The day the earth will quake and the mountains (too), and the mountains will become a heap of running sand
We have sent to you a messenger, a witness over you, as We had sent a messenger to Pharaoh
But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a severe seizure
If you reject, then how will you guard (yourselves) on the day which will make children grey headed
(and) on which (day) the sky will be cleft asunder ? His promise is to be fulfilled
This is certainly a reminder, so whoever wills, let him take a way towards his Lord

Your Lord certainly knows that you stand (for worship, salat) nearly two thirds of the night and (sometimes) half of it or one third of it along with a party of those with you, and God measures out the night and the day, He knows that you are not able to keep count of the (length of night), so He has turned to you (mercifully). Therefore recite as much of the Quran as may be easy for you. He knows that there will be (some who are) sick among you and others traveling in the earth seeking from God’s grace and (still) others fighting in the way of God. So recite as much of the (Quran) as may be easy (for you) and establish worship (salat) and give charity (zakat) and loan to God a good loan. And whatever of good you send in advance for yourselves, you will find it with God, (and) it will be better and greater in reward (compared to your good deeds). And seek protective forgiveness from God, God is certainly Protectively Forgiving, Merciful
O you (who are) covered with cloth
Rise, then warn
and then (declare) the greatness of your Lord
and then keep your clothes clean
and then forsake uncleanliness
and do not bestow favour (with the intention of) receiving more (in return)
and then be patient for (the sake of) your Lord
So (the day) when the trumpet will be sounded
then that day will be the day of difficulty
it will not be easy for the disbelievers
Leave Me and him whom I created alone
and assigned to him extensive wealth
and sons who are witnessed (being always present before him)
and made habitable for him (his) habitation
(Even) then he hopes that I would give him more
By no means ! he offers opposition to Our signs
I will involve him in a severe punishment
He reflected and made a programme
So be he killed, how he made a programme
again be he killed, how he made a programme
Then he looked
then he frowned and made a face
then he turned away considering himself great
then said, “This is nothing but magic derived from the ancient
this is nothing but the statement of man.”
I will make him enter hell
And what will make you realize what hell is
It does not let (anything) to remain nor does it spare
It will burn and darken the skin (of man)
Over it are nineteen

And We have not appointed the guardians of hell, other than the angels, and We have not fixed their number but for the affliction of those who do not believe. So that those who are given the book may be certain and those who believe may increase in belief and those who were given the book and the believers may not be doubtful. And those in whose hearts is a disease and the disbelievers may say, “What does God intend by this similitude?” Thus God leaves to stray whom He wills and He guides whom He wills and no one knows the forces of your Lord except He Himself and this is nothing but a reminder to man
No, by the moon
and the night when it retreats
and the day when it shines
it (the news of hell) is certainly a great
warning to man
to him among you who wills to advance or remain behind
Every soul is held in pledge (security) for that which it earned
except the companions of the right hand
in gardens, asking each other
about the criminals
“What has brought you into the hell?”
They will say, “We were not of those who offered worship (salat)
and we did not feed the poor
and we used to involve ourselves in idle talk with those involved in idle talk
and we used to deny the day of judgment
till (death) which is certain came to us.”
So the mediation of mediators will not be of benefit to them
So what is (wrong) with them that they turn away from the reminder
as if they are frightened asses
fleeing from a lion
No, every man from among them desires that he should be given open pages
No, they do not fear the hereafter
No, it is certainly a reminder
so whoever wills may mind it
and they do not mind unless God wills, He is worthy to be feared and capable to be Protectively Forgiving
No, I do swear by the day of resurrection
no,! and I do swear by the self-accusing soul (the conscience)
Does man think that We will not gather his bones
Why not! We are able to put in order his very finger tips
No, man intends to exceed the limits (set) before him
He asks, “When is the day of resurrection?”
(It will be) then, when the sight will be dazzled
and the moon will sink
when the sun and the moon will be brought together
Man will say on that day, “Where is the place to flee?”
By no means ! (there is) no place of refuge
The only place to stay on that day, will be near your Lord
Man will be informed on that day about what he had sent before him (preferred) and what he had put (behind his) back (i.e. he will be informed of his priorities)
No, man will be a witness against his own soul
though he will put forward his excuses
(While reciting the Quran) do not move your tongue (fast) with it (so as to) make haste with it
(The responsibility of) collecting it and reciting it, is certainly on Us
Therefore when We recite it, then follow its recitation
Then (the responsibility of) its explanation (too), is certainly on Us
No, but you love that which hastens away (life of this world)
and neglect the hereafter
Faces on that day will be radiant (with happiness)
looking towards their Lord
and (other) faces on that day will be gloomy
expecting that (some) disaster is to fall on them
No, when the (soul) reaches the throat
and it is said, “Who could be a magician (or a physician to save his life)?”
And he expects that it is (the time of) parting
and one ankle is joined with (the other) ankle
towards your Lord, on that day, will be the driving
So he neither accepted the truth nor worshipped (offered salat)
but denied and turned back
Then he went to his people, walking boastfully
Sorrow upon sorrow for you
again sorrow upon sorrow for you
Does man think that he (was created) to be left off without (fulfilling) any purpose
Was he not a sperm in the seminal fluid which is emitted
Then it became something that clings and hangs like a leech, so He proportioned it then set it in equilibrium
Then He made from it two kinds, the male and the female
Is He not able to give life to the dead
There has passed on man a period of time when he was not a thing (worth) a discussion
We certainly created man from a sperm mingled (with egg) to test him, therefore We made him hearing, seeing
We have shown him the way (now it is left to him) whether he becomes one who gratefully accepts or becomes one who ungratefully rejects (it)
We have prepared for the disbelievers, chains and yokes and a blazing fire
And the righteous will certainly drink from a cup, the admixture of which will be kafur
a spring from which the servants of God will drink, they will make it to gush forth, a gushing forth
They fulfil their vows and fear a day, the evil of which will spread far and wide
And they feed for His love, the poor and the orphan and the prisoner, with food
(saying), “We feed you only (to seek the) Attention of God, we do not intend (to receive) any reward from you nor (even your) thanks
We certainly fear from our Lord, a distressful day of frowning.”
So God will save them from the evil of that day and He will make them to meet radiant happiness and joy
and reward them with a garden and (garments of) silk, because they were patient
reclining therein on couches, they will neither see the sun nor (experience) intense cold therein
And the shades of the (garden) will be near above them and the clusters of it will be made to hang low (being in their reach)
And goblets of silver and cups of (transparent) glass will be made to go round about them, (they will be)
(transparent as) glass (but made) of silver*, which are measured according to a measure
And they will be made to drink therein, a cup, the admixture of which will be Zanjabil
a spring therein, which is named Salsabil
Youths always staying (in attendance) will go round them. When you see them, you will think them to be scattered pearls
And when (ever) you see, there you will see (only) excellence and a great kingdom
Upon them will be garments of fine green silk and thick silk interwoven with gold, and they will be adorned with brackets of silver and their Lord will make them drink a clean drink
This is certainly a reward for you, and your striving will be acknowledged
We have sent down the Quran on you, sending (it) down gradually
So wait patiently for the command of your Lord, and do not obey any sinner or any disbeliever among them
And remember the name of your Lord, morning and evening
and during (part) of the night, prostrate before Him, and glorify Him (during) a long (portion of the) night
These certainly love that which hastens away (life of this world) and put away behind them (the thought of) a weighty day
We have created them and We have strengthened their frame and when We will We can bring in their place (others) like them, changing (completely)
This is certainly a reminder, so whoever wills, He may take a way towards his Lord
and you do not will unless God wills, God is certainly Knowing, Wise
He makes to enter His mercy whom He wills; and the unjust, He has prepared for them a painful punishment
By those sent one after another
then the violent winds, blowing violently
and those that scatter, scattering
then those that distinguish, distinguishing (right from wrong)
then those that bring down the reminder
excusing or warning
That which you are promised will certainly befall
So when the stars are made to disappear
and when the sky is cleft asunder
and when the mountains are uprooted as dust
and when the messengers are brought (at their) appointed time
For which day (is this) timed
For the day of decision
And what will make you realize, what the day of decision is
Sorrowful will be the state on that day, of the deniers
Did We not destroy the ancients
Then We made the others to follow them
Thus do We deal with the criminals
Sorrowful will be the state on that day, of the deniers
Did We not create you from a fluid (which is) weakened after vigor
Then We made it to stay in a place
till (the fulfilment of) the known programme
thus We programmed, for We are Excellent Programmers
Sorrowful will be the state on that day, of the deniers
Did We not make the earth, one that draws together to itself
the living and the dead (due to the force of its gravity)
And We made therein lofty ranges of mountains and gave you to drink sweet water
Sorrowful will be the state on that day, of the deniers
(It will be said to them), “Proceed towards that which you used to deny
Proceed towards the covering having three branches
neither (giving) cool shade nor making one free from the flame
it certainly throws sparks like palaces
as if they were yellow camels.”
Sorrowful will be the state on that day, of the deniers
This is the day (on which) they will not speak
And permission will not be given to them that they may put forth excuses
Sorrowful will be the state on that day, of the deniers
This is the day of decision, We have gathered you and the ancients
So if there is any plot you have, then do plot against Me
Sorrowful will be the state on that day, of the deniers
Those who had guarded (against evil) will be in shades and springs
and fruits which they desire
(It will be said), “Eat and drink pleasantly because of that, which you used to do.”
Thus do We reward the doers of good
Sorrowful will be the state on that day, of the deniers
Eat and enjoy yourselves for a while, you are certainly criminals
Sorrowful will be the state on that day, of the deniers
And when it is said to them to bow down, they do not bow down
